attributes.action: Bring our soldiers home now from Iraq and Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In 1914 to 1918,and 1939 to 1945, many hundreds of thousands died defending this country from the germans, especially from hitler, but now our soldiers are being killed in Iraq and Afghanistan, to protect those countries and not ours, we being over there will never stop terrorism from happening in this country. Admit you lied Mr Blair and bring OUR SOLDIERS HOME NOW before you have more of their blood on your hands

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
